title: Key Concepts in Urban Mobility and Planning

quizzes.question: What is the primary goal of Sustainable Urban Mobility Plans (SUMPs)?
options: To create visually appealing urban designs
To improve quality of life for everyone
To increase the number of private cars
quizzes.explanation: SUMPs aim to improve quality of life by rethinking how people and goods move around, focusing on real-world mobility needs.

quizzes.question: What is a major challenge associated with urban sprawl?
options: More traffic jams and greenhouse gas emissions
quizzes.explanation: Urban sprawl leads to more traffic jams and a spike in greenhouse gas emissions due to low-density housing and reliance on private cars.

quizzes.question: How does transit-oriented development (TOD) support urban planning?
options: By organizing growth around public transport hubs
By reducing the use of public transport
quizzes.explanation: TOD organizes urban growth around public transport hubs, promoting medium to high-density living and mixed land use.
